login.heading: Login to Account
login.description: Please enter your email address to log in to your account.

signup.heading: Create an Account
signup.description: Please enter your email address to create your account.
signup.createAccountText: By Clicking on “Create Account” you accept our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
signup.passwordStrength: Password must be at least 6 characters

reset.heading: Recover Your Password
reset.description: We'll send you a link to your email. Follow the instructions to reset your password.
reset.resetDescription: Please provide your desired new password and confirm it for verification.

home.imageTestingDesc: We always want to hear from you! Let us know how we can best help you and we'll do our very best.
home.textTestingDesc: We always want to hear from you! Let us know how we can best help you and we'll do our very best.
